forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Widespread fog and a chance of rain before 7pm, then widespread fog and a chance of rain and snow between 7pm and 10pm, then a slight chance of drizzle between 10pm and 11pm, then patchy fog and a slight chance of drizzle between 11pm and 1am, then patchy fog and a slight chance of rain. Cloudy, with a low around 34. West northwest wind around 8 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy fog and a slight chance of rain before noon. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 40. West wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Wednesday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy. Low around 31, with temperatures rising to around 33 overnight. Southwest wind around 5 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Chance Light Rain
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain after 1pm. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 48. South wind 5 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

Northwest wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: All loops are far better than they need to be for Wonderful Skiing !

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: New snow! Yay! Thank you groomers for making the tough decision to put down snow well in advance of the races this coming weekend’s. It’s a tough balancing act.Tracks are deep and the dirt from yesterday is buried under the new snow. But new snow means soft snow and with the warm up tonight and rain tomorrow that means that how we leave Bucks Run today is how it will be tomorrow.

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails are in great shape with a classic track. We will pack trails this morning.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday thru Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 p.m.
nubsNob.comments: All of the fresh snow from yesterday is groomed into the base and conditions are very good. The snow has a bit of moisture to it and should be excellent for skiing first thing this morning. Visibility may be a challenge at times today, currently there is a dense fog at the top. The wind is light and the temperature should stay near 32 degrees for the day. Pintail Peak lodge is open with food and beverage service. The soup of the day is "it's in there". The lifts will spin from 9:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. with an hour break at 4:30 p.m. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
